description.p: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

description.p: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
